title: ASUS Logo
content:
Does anyone know what typeface was used to make the ASUS logo.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [asus\_above\_01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018014515/http:/typophile.com/files/asus_above_01.jpg) | 5.37 KB |
author: Victor Xavier

comments.content:
Sorry, also forgot to ask opinions on what other typefaces would work well with this typeface.

Thank you.

VX,  
I guess actually there's no font used for the ASUS logo letters.  
It is only a non typographic design that, from my humble point of view, lacks of some typographic attributes: unions between curved and linear strokes are inconsistently sharp, shapes are imbalanced, spacing is poor.  
If you need a complementary face for it, I suggest you any light sans typo (Eurostyle would be fine) that barely resembles the characters but contrasts in weight as well, too.

Marcelo Soler

Marcelo, thank you very much for your feedback. I`m going to check out Eurostyle.

Cheers.
